Question: Jiangsu Chenyang Electronics Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Jiangsu Chenyang Electronics Co., Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Specializes in production of switching power adapters, chargers, LED drive power supplies, wireless chargers, car keyless systems, and more
- Occupies 90,000 sqm area with 80,000 sqm construction area, with over 3,000 employees
- R&D centers in Shenzhen and Taiwan, and offices and shipping warehouses in multiple cities
- Produces and sells 150 million switching power supply adapters/chargers, 10 million LED drive power supplies, 30 million linear power supplies, and 50 million high and low frequency transformers annually
- Focuses on investing in automation equipment and increasing employees to over 5,000 based on market demand
- Offers a diverse and complete range of semiconductor products including wafers, discrete devices, power management ICs, diodes, bipolar transistors, MOSFETs, IGBTs, and third-generation semiconductor products

Contact: +86-511-86482222, chenyang@chenyangelec.com
Summary_cn:
江苏辰阳电子有限公司。

CES 2024产品亮点

- 专业生产开关电源适配器、充电器、LED驱动电源、无线充电器、汽车无钥匙系统等
- 占地面积9万平方米，建筑面积8万平方米，员工超过3000人
- 在深圳和台湾设有研发中心，并在多个城市设有办公室和配送仓库
- 每年生产和销售1.5亿个开关电源适配器/充电器，1000万个LED驱动电源，3000万个线性电源，5000万个高低频变压器
- 根据市场需求，专注于投资自动化设备，并将员工增加到5000人以上
- 提供多元化和完整的半导体产品，包括晶圆、离散元件、功率管理集成电路、二极管、双极晶体管、MOSFET、IGBT和第三代半导体产品

联系方式：+86-511-86482222，chenyang@chenyangelec.com
